description: Highest degree of an irreducible representation of the alternating group A_n of degree n.
prog: (MAGMA) list:= []; for i in [1..23] do "i = ", i; g:= Alt(i); ct:= CharacterTable(g); "ct =", ct[ #ct][1]; Append(~list, ct[ #ct][1]); end for; - Colva Roney-Dougal (colva(AT)mcs.st-and.ac.uk), Mar 30 2007
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), May 08 2001
extensions: More terms from Colva Roney-Dougal (colva(AT)mcs.st-and.ac.uk), Mar 30 2007
